alert.note: Alert for Laclede (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 3:12PM CDT until August 29 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Laclede County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 311 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Lebanon, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lebanon... Stoutland... Twin Bridges... Sleeper... Dry Knob... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 128 and 143. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
